location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Declaration Regarding Bales Stored in the Factory at Bushire

mods.abstract: This item declares that the following signatories, in response to a request from Nawab Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Resident of Bushier [ sic], have inspected the factory and have found that the bales have been stored correctly: William Bruce, Assistant; C Milland, Purser; Emanuel Margotty, Captain; George Weaver, Lieutenant, Marines; David Ross, Volunteer; Hector Tulloh, Surgeon. A note which precedes the declaration suggests that it was meant to be appear earlier in the file but was omitted by mistake.
